project_abstract.cdata: The proposed project would address a number of needs by assisting the Government in: (a) improving quality of future construction works by modernizing highway design, and by updating and improving construction and material specifications; (b) increasing the cost-effectiveness of highway investments by improving economic evaluation techniques for the evaluation and selection of road investments, and by supporting Government's new policy of moving to competitive bidding for public works; (c) supporting a highway research program, with particular emphasis on improving and strengthening the existing paved national road network, improving road capacity in congested areas and improving road safety; and (d) strengthening the capabilities of staff working in the highways subsector by carrying out a training program. In addition, the project would support the Government's program for completing the national road network by constructing or improving about 230 km out of a total 4,000 km of missing links in the network. It would also support a national program of improving economic activity in rural areas through the construction or improvement of about 1,400 km of rural roads.

P003447.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>第一公路项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>本项目将协助中国政府采取以下措施，以满足多种交通运输需求：（1）通过采用现代设计方案及更新并完善建设和材料规范，提高今后建设工程的质量；（2）通过完善公路投资经济评价和选择方法、支持中国政府实施其新出台的公共工程竞争性招标政策，提高公路投资的成本效益；（3）支持开展公路研究工作，其重点内容为改造并加固现有国道网、提高拥堵地区公路通行能力以及改善公路安全状况；（4）通过实施培训计划增加公路行业工作人员的能力。此外，项目将建设或改造国道网中4000公里尚未连通路段的约230公里路段，以此支持中国政府实施旨在完成国道网建设的规划；通过建设或改造约1400公里农村公路，支持实施全国农村公路改造工程，以增强农村地区经济活力。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
P003447.docty: Project Completion Report,Credit Agreement,Memorandum & Recommendation of the President,Staff Appraisal Report
